testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to update holiday information for the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: The update of the holiday record via the API should be confirmed through the API itself.
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/holidayDetails" path parameters....................passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the holiday 78 for which details are to be accessed, to send to the api holidayDetails endpoint..passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the response returned from the api holidayDetails endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the name information in the response body is "Bayram"..passed
